events.title: Introduction to Sustainable Farming Webinar
events.description: Learn the basics of sustainable farming practices and how to apply your tech skills to modern agriculture in this interactive webinar.

events.title: Tech in Agriculture Networking Mixer
events.description: Connect with other tech professionals interested in agriculture at this in-person networking event. Refreshments will be provided.
events.location: Green Space Innovation Hub, San Francisco

events.title: Hydroponics Workshop for Beginners
events.description: A hands-on workshop where you'll learn how to set up your own hydroponic growing system using affordable materials and technology.

events.title: AgTech Startup Showcase
events.description: Watch presentations from innovative AgTech startups and learn about the latest technologies being developed for the agriculture industry.

events.title: Farm Visit: Tech Integration in Action
events.description: Tour a working farm that has successfully integrated various technologies to improve efficiency, sustainability, and productivity.

events.title: Data Analytics for Farm Management
events.description: Learn how to apply data analytics skills to farm management, including crop yield prediction, resource optimization, and decision support systems.
